task.title: How to travel to the port
task.shortdesc: Here are the steps to traveling to the port in Orlando, Florida to board the cruise. You will drive to the port from Virginia Tech, which is a 10.5 hour drive.

step.cmd: Search directions on Google Maps from Virginia Tech to Port Canaveral in Orlando, Florida.
Leave at 6 a.m. on Saturday for Port Canaveral.Alternate drivers throughout the car ride.
Arrive at the port and park in designated parking lot.
